plot: Simon, a Jewish police inspector, arrests Karim, a Muslim, in the bust of a drug smuggling cargo ship, only to realize that Karim is an undercover agent from the military intelligence, ...
title: Unidos por las armas
plot_es: Simon, a Jewish police inspector, arrests Karim, a Muslim, in the bust of a drug smuggling cargo ship, only to realize that Karim is an undercover agent from the military intelligence, ...
plot_en: Simon, a Jewish police inspector, arrests Karim, a Muslim, in the bust of a drug smuggling cargo ship, only to realize that Karim is an undercover agent from the military intelligence, ...

cast.role: Karim Hamida - un policier arabe infiltré dans un gang de trafiquants
cast.name: Richard Berry

cast.role: Simon Atlan - un inspecteur de police juif impulsif et violent
cast.name: Patrick Bruel

cast.role: Ali Radjani - un employé de l'ambassade, chef d'un réseau terroriste
cast.name: Saïd Amadis

cast.role: Lisa Vernier - l'ex-femme de Simon dont Karim tombe amoureux
cast.name: Corinne Dacla

cast.role: Blanche Atlan - une restauratrice, la mère de Simon
cast.name: Marthe Villalonga
